snippet: A reader says not all black women want to be fat.
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: As a black woman of a certain weight, I read ''Black Women and Fat,'' by Alice Randall (Sunday Review, May 6), with interest. Finally! The reason so many black women struggle with weight will be revealed! We learn that it's not only because we want to be fat, but also because our men want to keep us that way.
